go_data.justification: p47phox-/- mice produced no superoxide and killed staphylococci ineffectively, indicating a role in bacterial defense.
p47phox-/- mice developed recurrent life-threatening bacterial and fungal infections, indicating a role in fungal defense.
p47phox is part of the phagocyte NADPH oxidase complex, which plays a critical role in mammalian host defense.
Leukocytes from p47phox-/- mice produced no superoxide, indicating a role for p47phox in superoxide production.
